sentences.en: A spokeswoman for the government denied the rumours.
sentences.cn: 一位政府女发言人否认了那些传言。

sentences.en: A spokeswoman said the agreement had been declared null and void.
sentences.cn: 一位女发言人说那个协议已被宣布为无效的。

sentences.en: A United Nations spokeswoman in New York said the request would be considered.
sentences.cn: 一位在纽约的联合国女发言人称该请求会被予以考虑。
